removing datastream using update departments script . . . Purged datastream (ID=MODS), versions ranging from the beginning of time to the end of time. oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A brief overview of 40 years of metal-containing polymers.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: abstract: A review on the prepn. and uses of organometallic polymers having metal-carbon bonds in the main or side chains or heteroatom-metal bonds in the main chain.
